settings.accordion_ans1: Our 100% buyer protection program allows for easy returns Only for products not as per description/photo on the website and products which you received in damaged/defective/broken" condition.

settings.accordion_title: How to raise dispute for an order?
settings.accordion_ans1: You can raise a dispute within 7 days of delivery, in either of by sending an email to support@mikshaa.com with images of broken/defective/damaged products within 7 days of delivery, please mention your order number in the email and sign into your Mikshaa account if you are a registered customer (Easy method).
Reverse pickup orders We will initiate refund once the item is picked up by our courier partner.
Delivery charge varies with each product. Most of product FREE delivery in India.

settings.accordion_title: What is the estimated delivery time?
settings.accordion_ans1: The estimated time of delivery is within 7 working days for domestic orders and 15-20 working days for international orders. All orders get shipped within 4 to 5 days from the warehouse.

settings.accordion_title: How will the delivery be done?
settings.accordion_ans1: We try to process all deliveries through reputed courier companies like Bluedart, Aramex,E-come, DTDC, DHL and Fedex. In some cases, your pincode is not serviceable by these courier companies, we use Indian Speed Post for those deliveries.
All items are carefully packaged as to avoid any form of damage.

settings.accordion_title: Who would be responsible for paying local taxes in countries outside of India?
settings.accordion_ans1: Customs duty & other international taxes etc. if applicable will have to be borne by the customer according to the laws of the land.

settings.accordion_title: How do i pay for a Mikshaa’s purchase?
settings.accordion_ans1: Mikshaa offers you multiple payment methods. Whatever your online mode of payment, you can trust assured that Mikshaa's trusted payment gateway partners use secure encryption technology to keep your transaction details confidential at all times.

settings.accordion_title: Can i make a credit/debit card or Internet Banking payment through my mobile?
settings.accordion_ans1: Yes, you can make credit card payments through the Mikshaa mobile site. Mikshaa uses 256-bit encryption technology to protect your card information while securely transmitting it to the secure and trusted payment gateways managed by leading banks.

settings.accordion_title: Is it safe to use my credit/debit card on Mikshaa?
settings.accordion_ans1: Is it safe to use my credit/debit card on Mikshaa?

settings.accordion_title: Does Craftsvilla store my credit card information?
settings.accordion_ans1: No, Mikshaa does not collect or store your account information at all. Your transaction is authorized at multiple points, first by EBS/CCavenue and subsequently by Visa/MasterCard/Amex secure directly without any information passing through us.

settings.about_banner_des: There is something about the saree that makes a woman look dignified, glorifying  and every bit stylish. Mikshaa was set up in the year 2017 with a motive to offer its designer collection at competitive price and merchantable quality to its whole  seller and worldwide online customer.

No matter what your individual style may be, you are sure to find a beautiful saree that will match your taste, given the large collection of stunning Indian sarees that can be worn almost on all the occasions be it wedding, formal parties, Bridal, family get togethers and more!

Mikshaa is the trusted online ethnic wears store and feels proud in Indian heritage and cultural diversity in women wears. With so many different styles of drape, so many different patterns and fabric choices, sarees can fill every wardrobe with much needed variety. When in doubt, it’s your best bet at looking elegant and put-together. Every state in India and worldwide are put together to cater best in terms of Indian fashion trends and women clothing range.

Mikshaa goals is the all worldwide delivered to ethnic wears for women. Celebrate big fat Indian occasions such as Diwali, Navratri, Durga Puja, Holi and marriage celebration with our evergreen collection of online Indian ethnic wears for women. A wide Variety of option are available at the click of mouse.

Mikshaa is a great online destination to explore its extraordinary collection for sarees and other ehnic wears the best part is the site has the most competitive price and a wide eclectic range of products guaranteed to satisfy every customer. Mikshaa ensures excellent delivery services to its buyer in a good condition and in a prompt manner.
Mikshaa collection is also available in the overseas market (USA, UK, Europe, Australia, Southeast Asia, Dubai, Srilanka and other countries) under the brand name of Mikshaa.

settings.pay_policy_que: How do i pay for a Vegist’s purchase?
settings.pay_policy_ans1: vegist offers you multiple payment methods. Whatever your online mode of payment, you can trust assured that Vegist's trusted payment gateway partners use secure encryption technology to keep your transaction details confidential at all times.
settings.pay_policy_ans2: You may use Internet Banking, Debit Card, Credit Card and Cash on Delivery to make your purchase. We also accept payments made using Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Any Club credit/debit cards.

settings.pay_policy_que: Can i make a credit/debit card or Internet Banking payment through my mobile?
settings.pay_policy_ans1: Yes, you can make credit card payments through the Vegist mobile site. Vegist uses 256-bit encryption technology to protect your card information while securely transmitting it to the secure and trusted payment gateways managed by leading banks.

settings.pay_policy_que: Is it safe to use my credit/debit card on Vegist?
settings.pay_policy_ans1: All Credit/Debit card details remain confidential and private. Vegist and our trusted payment gateways use SSL encryption technology to protect your card information.

settings.pay_policy_que: Does Craftsvilla store my credit card information?
settings.pay_policy_ans1: No, Vegist does not collect or store your account information at all. Your transaction is authorized at multiple points, first by EBS/CCavenue and subsequently by Visa/MasterCard/Amex secure directly without any information passing through us.

settings.ship_policy_ans1: Delivery charge varies with each product. Most of product FREE delivery in India.
settings.ship_policy_ans2: Some items may have a shipping cost depending on the product.

settings.ship_policy_que: What is the estimated delivery time?
settings.ship_policy_ans1: The estimated time of delivery is within 7 working days for domestic orders and 15-20 working days for international orders. All orders get shipped within 4 to 5 days from the warehouse.

settings.ship_policy_que: How will the delivery be done?
settings.ship_policy_ans1: We try to process all deliveries through reputed courier companies like Bluedart, Aramex,E-come, DTDC, DHL and Fedex. In some cases, your pincode is not serviceable by these courier companies, we use Indian Speed Post for those deliveries.
settings.ship_policy_ans2: If there is no courier service available in your area, we will get in touch with you and try to work out a convenient alternate delivery location that is serviced by our courier partners.

settings.ship_policy_ans1: All items are carefully packaged as to avoid any form of damage.

settings.ship_policy_que: Who would be responsible for paying local taxes in countries outside of India?
settings.ship_policy_ans1: Customs duty & other international taxes etc. if applicable will have to be borne by the customer according to the laws of the land.

settings.ret_policy_ans1: Our 100% buyer protection program allows for easy returns Only for products not as per description/photo on the website and products which you received in damaged/defective/broken" condition.
settings.ret_policy_ans2: All products must be returned in their original condition along with the bills and labels.

settings.ret_policy_que: How to raise dispute for an order?
settings.ret_policy_ans1: You can raise a dispute within 7 days of delivery, in either of by sending an email to support@mikshaa.com with images of broken/defective/damaged products within 7 days of delivery, please mention your order number in the email and sign into your Mikshaa account if you are a registered customer (Easy method).
settings.ret_policy_ans2: Product After 7 days Of Delivery Return Can not accepted.

settings.ret_policy_ans1: Reverse pickup orders We will initiate refund once the item is picked up by our courier partner.
settings.ret_policy_ans2: Self ship orders We will refund when your item back from warehouse. The refund amount wii be credited within 3 to 5 working days in your Mikshaa Acoount.

settings.testi_desc: Full delivery, buy many times feel very delicious and delicious than many other brands will support next time

Write HePearl green chili salt 80g jar, with 70% chili, makes the dish delicious, used to dip barbecue, seafood
The shop packed the goods very carefully and delivered quickly, the product is exactly as pictured, not defective, worth the money. I will buy it again, everyone should buy it...

It's delicious, just follow the instructions and cook it. Salty salt is according to taste, through Malaysia selling very salty water, I eat it and it's delicious. I cook 1kg5 ribs, then play 2 packs + 5l water.
The chili salt is heavy with a piece of lemon or kumquat, it can be used, dipped with grilled food, seafood is very delicious, the spicy taste is moderate and delicious.
Salt has a moderate salty taste, slightly sweet after. For the price, it's quite reasonable.
